name: Continuous (BolrikDev)
description:
CONTINUES is a first-person puzzle-platformer where you try to reach the goal as fast as possible.

Gain different Abilities and solve the puzzles before attempting to speedrun and get the best score!

Learn the best route and know each and every shortcut and try to beat the 'Developer Times' =)

NOTE

If there is any lag in the web version... consider using the Downloadable Versions

Features

  • Up to 6 different Abilities to obtain and utilize
  • 9 Levels and 1 Playground
  • 3 Secrets (Listen for strange sound sources =))

Controls

[WASD] Move
[Mouse] Look
[Left Mouse Button] Interact
[Shift] Sprint
[Spacebar] Jump
[R] Quick Restart Level
[Esc] Return to Main Menu

Behind the scenes

This is my attempt at working on a project all year round.
I will try to use every theme from this and all upcoming "Game Dev Field Guide Monthly Game Jams" and include it in the game. This means that at best there will be a few new features every month.

Stay tuned!
